releaseNotes: 🎉 Enhanced Team Shifts Management with comprehensive dashboard
✅ Fixed Break Time calculation - now properly excludes from delay calculations
📊 Added Break Time count display to team shifts summary
🔧 Improved CSV Export for team shifts - matches main shifts page format
🎨 Reorganized team shifts layout - 4 cards per row for better organization
📱 Enhanced Team Statistics with proper count displays
⚡ Smart Offsetting Summary with detailed breakdown
🎯 Fixed unrealistic hour calculations in CSV exports
🔒 Enhanced data validation and error handling
🔧 NEW: Fix Calculator - Recalculate all shifts based on assigned shift durations
🔄 NEW: Shift Change functionality in Team Shifts - Change shifts directly from monthly shifts table
📅 NEW: Bulk Assignment in Shift Management - Assign shifts for entire months with one click
⏰ NEW: Automatic Friday Day Off - Set Fridays as day off automatically in bulk assignments
🎯 NEW: Real-time shift duration calculations - Uses actual shift start/end times from database
💡 NEW: Auto-recalculation of regular/overtime hours when shifts are changed
🛡️ Enhanced permission system - Content & Creative Managers can now edit events and Q&A
📊 Improved shift management efficiency - Bulk operations save hours of manual work
